# sakura_workflows_plan (Data Source)

Get information about a Workflow Plan.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_workflows_plan" "foobar" {
  name = "200Kプラン"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the Workflows Plan.

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the Workflows Plan.

### Read-Only

- `base_price` (Number) The base price of the Workflows Plan.
- `grade` (Number) The grade of the Workflows Plan.
- `included_steps` (Number) The included steps of the Workflows Plan.
- `overage_price_per_unit` (Number) The overage price per unit of the Workflows Plan.
- `overage_step_unit` (Number) The overage step unit of the Workflows Plan.
